nodes.title: Article 3
nodes.summary:
This partial document covers two main points: the penalties for using an unassigned numbering resource and the payment rules for numbering-related taxes.

Specifically, Article 3 states that using an unassigned resource triggers payment of the relevant allocation and annual taxes, plus a fine of 100% to 200% of those tax amounts.

Article 4 details the payment schedule: the numbering tax is due upon reservation or allocation of resources, while the annual tax is due by March 31 of the following year. It also specifies that the tax is calculated pro-rata for the first year or if activities cease mid-year.

nodes.title: Article 6
nodes.summary: This partial document is the final article (Article 6) of an official decree or order ("Arrêté") from the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It specifies the officials responsible for its execution (the President of the Regulatory Authority College and the Director General of the Directorate General of Administrative, Judicial, Domain Revenues and Participations) and states that the order comes into force on the date of its signature. It includes the place and date of enactment (Kinshasa, February 2, 2011) and the signatures of the Minister of Finance and the Vice-Prime Minister. A website disclaimer is also appended, noting the site is under construction and that the published texts do not engage the responsibility of the hosting associations.
